channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Everything you wanted to know about a recession but were afraid to ask
RBC identifies the key level that the S&P 500 needs to hold
HSBC says three different scenarios are bullish for gold, which is at a record.
The market is starting to price in more aggressive tariffs, says Morgan Stanley
Investors looking for clarity on Trumpâ€™s tariffs on April 2 risk disappointment
Trump says reciprocal tariffs will target all countries
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday that reciprocal tariffs he is set to announce this week will include all nations, not just a small group of...

item.title: South Korea, China, Japan agree to promote regional trade as Trump tariffs loom
item.description: The countries agreed to "closely cooperate for a comprehensive and high-level" talks on a South Korea-Japan-China free trade agreement deal.

item.title: Trump's promised 'Liberation Day' of tariffs is coming. Here's what it could mean for you
item.description: Here's what you should know about the impending trade penalties.

item.title: Pentagon's Hegseth says US command in 'warrior' Japan being upgraded to deter China
item.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth described Japan on Sunday as indispensable for tackling Chinese aggression.

item.title: Trump administration reportedly warns European companies to comply with anti-DEI order
item.description: The Trump administration has reportedly sent letters to European companies asking them to comply with a U.S. executive order banning DEI initiatives.
